title: Accessibility Agents v2.1: Developer Tools Team, 5 Platforms, and 55 Agents
summary: v2.1 brings a complete Developer Tools team with 6 new agents for Python, wxPython, desktop accessibility, and tool building. Plus CI/CD scanner integration, 3 structured audit rule sets, and platform support expanded to Codex CLI and Gemini CLI.

title: Building an Accessible Calendar with AI -- and Letting the Agents Review Their Own Work
summary: A walkthrough of building the Community Access calendar with Claude Code, running our own accessibility agents against it, and why the grid pattern got thrown out for an agenda list.

title: Blind Developers Launch Open Source AI Agent Teams to Fix Accessibility Gap in AI Coding Tools
summary: Community Access announces the public launch of Accessibility Agents -- 47 specialized AI agents, 14 knowledge modules, and 52 pre-built prompts across Claude Code, GitHub Copilot, and Claude Desktop.
